entry.summary: Custom Domain Tutorial for Github Pages Use your domain to replace the original github.io address About Github Pages Github Pages is a free static page hosting service provided by Github. All Github Free accounts can use it directly for Public Repos, while Private Repos require a paid upgrade of the Github account.
